entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Fort Nelson
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:02 p.m. PDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Low plus 5 except plus 1 near the Rockies.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wet snow near the Rockies overnight. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 5 except plus 1 near the Rockies. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 12 except temperature steady near plus 1 over southern sections.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning late in the afternoon. Wet snow near the Rockies. Snowfall amount 10 cm over southern sections. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late in the morning. High 12 except temperature steady near plus 1 over southern sections. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain. Low plus 3 except zero near the Rockies.
